name: GHOST HUNTER
description:
Embark on an ethereal journey in Ghost Hunter, where the thrill of the hunt meets the challenge of the unknown. Equip yourself for spectral encounters and customize your character to reflect your own ghost-hunting style.

Create Your Own Ghost Hunter

Craft your own ghost hunting outfit from the several avaliable options, mix and match until you have your perfect style.

Engage with the Eerie

Navigate through chilling environments, each haunted by its own set of unique spirits. Capture them and use their power to your benefit.

Confront the Paranormal

Face off against formidable ghost bosses, each presenting a complex challenge. Decipher their patterns and exploit their weaknesses to emerge victorious.

Evolve and Enhance

Progress through the game to unlock powerful upgrades. Strengthen your gear and abilities to become the most formidable ghost hunter the world has ever seen.

Embark on Diverse Missions

Progress through the missions to uncover the secrets of the haunted mansion.

Immersive Gameplay

Experience Designed for players who enjoy a casual yet captivating gaming experience. Ghost Hunter is easy to dive into, offering short, satisfying play sessions with long-term progression.
